NotERC20RewardsAdmin().details: Error when caller does not have ERC20 Rewards Admin role

NotNativeEthRestakeAdmin().details: Errror when caller does not have ETH Restake Admin role

NotRestakeManager().details: Error when caller is not RestakeManager contract

NotRestakeManagerAdmin().details: Error for caller not having permissions

OverMaxBasisPoints().details: Error for exceeding max basis points (100%)

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

constructor.details: Prevents implementation contract from being initialized.

depositETHFromProtocol().details: Handle ETH sent to the protocol through the RestakeManager - e.g. user deposits ETH will be stored here until used for a validator deposit

initialize(address).details: Initializes the contract with initial vars

setFeeConfig(address,uint256).details: Sets the config for fees - if either value is set to 0 then fees are disabled

setRestakeManager(address).details: Sets the address of the RestakeManager contract

stakeEthFromQueue(address,bytes,bytes,by.details: Function called by ETH Restake Admin to start the restaking process in Native ETH Only callable by a permissioned account

sweepERC20(address).details: Sweeps any accumulated ERC20 tokens in this contract to the RestakeManager Only callable by a permissioned account
